dcterms:creator: Guergana Petrova
Przemys law Wojtaszczyk
dcterms:description: This dataset provides estimates for the Lipschitz widths, which are used to study the approximation properties of neural networks.
dcterms:title: Lipschitz widths

dcterms:creator: F. O. Dominguez Cobos
T. Kuhn
dcterms:description: This dataset contains approximation and entropy numbers of embeddings between various approximation spaces, which are referenced for understanding the performance of neural networks.
dcterms:title: Approximation and entropy numbers of embeddings between approximation spaces

dcterms:creator: Guergana Petrova
Przemys law Wojtaszczyk
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the limitations on approximation capabilities of deep and shallow neural networks, providing insights into their performance.
dcterms:title: Limitations on approximation by deep and shallow neural networks

dcterms:creator: R. DeVore
B. Hanin
Guergana Petrova
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the approximation capabilities of neural networks, detailing their performance in various contexts.
dcterms:title: Neural Network Approximation

dcterms:creator: Z. Shen
H. Yang
S. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the optimal approximation rates of ReLU networks in relation to their width and depth, providing theoretical insights into their performance.
dcterms:title: Optimal approximation rate of relu networks in terms of width and depth

dcterms:creator: D. Yarotsky
dcterms:description: This dataset provides error bounds for approximations made with deep ReLU networks, offering insights into their performance and limitations.
dcterms:title: Error bounds for approximations with deep relu networks

dcterms:creator: D. Yarotsky
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the optimal approximation of continuous functions by very deep ReLU networks, providing theoretical insights into their capabilities.
dcterms:title: Optimal approximation of continuous functions by very deep ReLU networks

dcterms:creator: D. Yarotsky
A. Zhevnerchuk
dcterms:description: This dataset presents the phase diagram of approximation rates for deep neural networks, offering a comprehensive view of their performance across different architectures.
dcterms:title: The phase diagram of approximation rates for deep neural networks
